## StateType.serialize() method

Serializes a state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
serialize(deserialized: T, helpers: StoreSerializeHelpers): S;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter    | Type                               | Description                             |
| ------------ | ---------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| deserialized | <code>T</code>                     | state to serialize                      |
| helpers      | <code>StoreSerializeHelpers</code> | helpers (e.g. to serialize an document) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`S`

serialized state
